description: Discipline of experimenting on a software system in production in order to build confidence in the system's capability to withstand turbulent and unexpected conditions.

name: Fuzzy Testing
description: Quality assurance technique used to discover coding errors and security loopholes in software, operating systems or networks. It involves inputting massive amounts of random data, called fuzz, to the test subject in an attempt to make it crash.

name: Webcomponents
description: Set of features that provide a standard component model for the Web allowing for encapsulation and interoperability of individual HTML elements

name: GraphQL

description: Catch visual regressions between the output of different application versions.
